title:
Beast Lair. You home village.


Its inhabitants suffer critical shortage of their favourite drink, cviček.
But there was a hero who went on a long and dangerous mission to bring cviček to his home village.

The beast hero decided to rob a military base in mountains, where vast quantities of confiscated
 cviček are stored ...

... those will be scrapped soon.


That would be a shame, no true beast would allow so much precious liquid to be thrown away.

But not everything went according to plan.


The hero has been captured by a Colonial patrol and is now imprisoned in an outpost, waiting for
 deportation to a secret prison for terrorism suspects.
He will need to do some clever tricks to escape and finish his mission ...
